attributes.action: Save the Crown on the British beer Pint glass.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A move by the European Parliament proposes the removal of the Crown on our pint glasses and the substitution with a ''CE'' mark.
The crown has been on our glasses for over 300 years and represents a fine British tradition which should be preserved.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save the Crown on the British beer Pint glass."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12536.asp

Prime Minister's Office
